title: Key Fragments
body:
Riot, why do you make key fragments so rare?

We need them to open chests, which have to be earned though skill, or a teamate's and is hard enough to come by. Why do you need to make the key fragments so rare as well. I'm bad at the game and am sitting on 5 chests atm, and its taken more than 2 weeks to not even obtain 3 frags. bull crap in my opinion.

Please buff the drop rate, or make it so you get one with 1st win or something

replies.body: PSA: play arams, even if you don't like them, in about 10 games i got 2 full keys. just screw around with mates, that's what aram is for.

Well it only drops for wins and drops more often with pre-mades. Playing in a 5 man premade raises the droprate by around 10%.
Just play shorter game modes like 15 min arams
There's also a nice 125rp key in the shop.
most of my games are with 3-4 man premades, and it's been 3 weeks since my last drop. I havn't gotten one since posting either

My bigger problem is the fact that having unlocked 20ish chests, i'm running out of champions to unlock them on, unless i start going into champions i don't overly want to play for chests, and will probably have a hard time getting chests on.

>im bad at the game

get better = win more 
which in turn gives you more keys
dont complain about the system, its fine AND free
